word: H6974 - קוּץ - qûwts - koots - Arise - எழுந்திரு

sections.paragraph: to awake, to wake up; (Hiphil) to awaken, to arouse, to show signs of waking, to awake

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root (rather identical with H6972 through the idea of abruptness in starting up from sleep (compare H3364)); to awake (literally or figuratively): - arise, (be) (a-) wake, watch.
